laboratory_examinations.findings: Phlegmonous soft tissue mass in the right to mid pelvis measuring 7.2 x 5.1 cm, with a hypoenhancing central component and hyperenhancing rim. Significant inflammatory changes and fat stranding surrounding the mass, with numerous regional reactive nodes. The liver is homogeneous without focal lesions and there is a likely cyst in the left kidney.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mass size increased from 6.7 x 4.7 cm to 7.2 x 5.1 cm.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 8.8 mg/dL, which is within the normal range (8.4-10.3 mg/dL).
